website_summaries.verdict: Why go to the park when you can bring the park to you? This set has everything, from swings to jungle gym.
pros: Holds up well in all weather
Includes more than your average swing set, including jungle gym
cons: The price on this set is high, but you get a lot of components for the money

customer_reviews.title: Jungle Gym - Kid tested, therapy center Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled, this jungle gym is awesome. It's super sturdy and kids love it. NOTE: This ships in 5 separate boxes, each approximately 1'x2'x7', and each is very heavy, especially the 2 boxes containing the jungle gym base. We lost a couple of joints and small bars in shipment simply due to the abuse the boxes take traveling across the country. Other than slight shipping delays for all the boxes to arrive, we enjoy and recommend this product. Definitely use a drill with Allen bits to assemble. If not, the assembly will take far too many hours. With drill, assembly took 1 person about 5 hours. Final dimensions are ~18' x 13.5' x 6.5'.
customer_reviews.author: Action C.

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set - we are the envy of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great swing set - we are the envy of the neighborhood. DID take a while for my husband to assembly - mostly the center climbing unit - but my 4 year old is OBSESSED. We switched out the drop bar for a baby swing so our little one could use it too and are very pleased. Definitely stands out in the yard - it is bright - but makes the kids SO HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Patterson

customer_reviews.title: All That glitters is not GOLD! looks good in picture...BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Box came totally damaged and taped and I did not order an open box set. Please read the reviews before you order because there are too many pieces to have to inventory to tell the manufacturer what is missing. Apparently there is little quality control in repackaging. I didn't open the open boxes. I thought I was ordering a unopened product. Nowhere did it indicate I was purchasing an open box or returned/repackaged product. Too many unsolvable problems and a huge hassle! so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: ron schreibman

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a drill.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. They're 5 and 3 an have plenty room to grow on this jungle gym. Definitely can be put together in a day. My wife and I finished before we could even argue. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE MENDOZA

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but could improve quality of plastic connectors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to have for multiple kids. It offers many different playing options and helps get the kids off of electronics and outside to play. What I didn’t like was how some of the plastic connectors stripped. This didn’t allow for proper tightening and it couldn’t be undone due to not having any extras of that part. It was also difficult to fix or adjust something as there are so many parts to this play set. The assembly was ok but not great.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a home daycare and LOVE this swingset... Works great for all ages !!
customer_reviews.author: Shysitter

customer_reviews.title: Make a day out of it to put together
customer_reviews.text: Whewww. It takes about 6 hours to put together if you do most of it by your self. So start early. My girls love it. I definitely recommend it but have patience putting it together! Very sturdy. No anchors come with it so be sure to order those as well.
customer_reviews.author: crystal W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Jungle Gym/Swing Set
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Really great quality. All items are top of the line and the kids love it! You can't go wrong with this company's products. Cons: Not the easiest to put together, differently a two person job. Really stick to the exact instructions or you'll have to redo an entire section which is very time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: Rusted chains
customer_reviews.text: Just like other posts have experienced rust on their chains, so did we. The plastic that covers the chain bracks off easily. The bars get really hot in summer as most metal items do. If this product had better chains I would have defiantly given this jungle gym more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gcg.sanfl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I had hoped for and more. My husband put it together one his own with the help of a 4 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Naillon

customer_reviews.title: The kids Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted a play set that she was able to climb on and hang from. We saw this and it was perfect! not only could she climb through the bars and hang from the bars, it also had a swing and a potential 2nd swing ( has 1 swing and rings) The son loves the swing while the daughter play on the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Christopper

customer_reviews.title: Kids are in love with it. Even the 8-11 year old neighbors. Definitely a product to grow into.
customer_reviews.text: We love this playground. Please be careful not to scratch during installation or you will be repainting. Customer service sent the missing parts (UPS lost them) immediately and have been fabulous to work with every step of the way.
customer_reviews.author: coloradogtcs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 2 year old love it! Sturdy and exactly what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The quality is so good, and my son likes it so much
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so good, and my son likes it so much. When I told the customer missed a little part, they help us handle it right now. Really very nice. Very child will enjoy the staff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All is all the set is great. It took two half days to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: the instructions have a few errors. All is all the set is great. It took two half days to put together but two ladies. It's very easy just time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great playset
customer_reviews.text: It took about 8 hours for one person to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's was very easy to assemble, instructions were easy to follow. Child LOVES the player. Very sturdy for climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara D Gaddie

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, kids love it, the bars do not get hot when in sun which is nice, built to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is a great playscape for the grandkids. Ages: 7, 6, 6, 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four out of five boxes arrived yesterday, two of ...
customer_reviews.text: Four out of five boxes arrived yesterday, two of the boxes that arrived are damaged and appear to be missing parts.. I will update this review as this project unfolds..
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: monkey bars too short for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my ten year old granddaughter. She is tall for her age and we placed the monkey bars right on top of the ground. They are too short for her because of her height. Is there a way to extend the monkey bar height? The set would improve in my eyes if there were.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: This gym is amazing and will provide many summers of fun
customer_reviews.text: This gym is amazing and will provide many summers of fun. It is a bit shorter than I thought it would be so the kids will probably be to big for it by the time they are 9 or 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jaborrowman

customer_reviews.title: Nice playset but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice playset and the kids love to play on it but the quality is terrible. It came already rusted and bent and few plastic covers broken. I wouldn't complain much about the broken plastic pieces because that could have been damaged during delivery but for the chains to be rusted out of the box is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Zaleska

customer_reviews.title: This jungle gym combo is amazing! The kids love the swinging bridge
customer_reviews.text: This jungle gym combo is amazing! The kids love the swinging bridge, which I haven't really seen anywhere else. The jungle gym lets the kids get out all of their energy, plus it is fun to have the swing set and monkey bars. Since it is so big it takes a while to put together, but it isn't that hard. Once again, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1423

customer_reviews.title: Great set and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The kids love it and it was easy to assemble. I did fine assembling it by myself (with occasional help from my 5-year old). One thing about assembling it - in the instructions they tell you to not tighten the screws and they are right - do NOT tighten them. It is because if you tighten them and you made a mistake, you won't open them again; the screw head will strip. The jungle gym is the time consuming part. The other three together took less time than the jungle gym alone.
customer_reviews.author: Azizjonok

product_meta.title: ActivPlay Modular Jungle Gym with Accessories
product_meta.description: The ActivPlay Modular Jungle Gym with accessories brings this classic childhood playground into your very own backyard! This unique modular design allows you to customize the shape and size of your playground. The complete jungle gym kit includes a jungle gym base, swing set, hanging bridge, and monkey bars. These accessories easily attach to any side of the jungle gym base, allowing for many different combinations. The jungle gym along with the accessories pass all playground safety standards, ensuring a safe experience for you and your family. The ActivPlay Modular Jungle Gym with Accessories is the perfect beginning to future backyard adventures.
feature_bullets: SAFETY IS OUR #1 PRIORITY: Meets or exceeds all ASTM safety standards
CONSTRUCTION: Weather and rust-resistant, powder coated 2" diameter steel tubing, 16 gauge steel
INCLUDES: Jungle Gym, swing set attachment, hanging bridge attachment, monkey bars attachment
SAFE DESIGN: Plastic-coated chains for added protection. No pinch joint covers protect child's fingers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
